name: Rotor’scope: The Secret of the Endless Energy
name_original: Rotor’scope: The Secret of the Endless Energy
description:
Rotor’scope: The Secret of the Endless Energy is a puzzle game developed by Nivel21 Entertainment. It came out on 02-02-2010. It was published by Nivel21 Entertainment.
Rotor’scope: The Secret of the Endless Energy is available on Xbox 360.
